janadhipathi gotabhaya rajapaksha da ohuge abhawaya sambandhayen siya twitar ginume satahanak thaba thibu athara, janadhipathiwaraya sandahan kara aththe  nirantharayen minisun sathutina thabu ohu samada janathawata sihipath wanu athi bawayi.

mamath meka anumatha karanawa noweyi.mamath oya prashna gana katha karanna gihin wihilukarayek wela thibenawa.wisheshayen malu gana katha karanna giyama samaharu kata ada karala hina wenne.mama mage adahas ehema pala kalata kisima upadanayakin mawa hirawela na.mama kisima bahira aramunaka sirakaruwek noweyi.eekayi niyama bauddha prathipadawa.

konstantin samaga pirisa malas namathi yakshaya alwa ganimata sarasenne malas aawesha wana kuda dariya bhawitha karamin.enamuth aya lesi pahasu kenek nowana atharama siyallangema sathurekuth wana kenek.me nisa malas alwa ganna gos athamek kalaya thula sira wimak siddha wenawa.ee athara waraye kuaasa da satanata paminenawa.esenam me prashna wisandagena malas alwa gannata konstantin athulu pirisa samath wewi da?
mul awadhiwaladi insiyulin nishpadanaya karanu labuwe uurange aganyasayen labaganna lada insiyulin walin bahutharayak wana athara ada bhawitha wana insiyulin jana thakshanaya magin nishpadanawi atha.
ithama watina lipiyak.me wage ahinsaka jiwitha kiyaknam biliwela athda kadikulappuwa haduna mathi amathi aarakshakayange saha sama harak padawana roda hathare wahanawalata kiyala hithenawa.

me sandaha nawika hamudawa yoda nogaththe ayi dayi asu prashnayata pilithuru dun rajapaksha mahatha weleda naw walata aarakshawa sapayima sandaha nawika hamudawa yoda ganima lokaye kisima rataka sidu nokarana bawath ewani aarakshawak laba dun wita eya weleda naukawak nowa yuda naukawak bawata pathwena bawath sandahan kaleya.me sandaha eka samagamak thora gaththe keseda yana prashnaya mathu wu namuth eeta pahadili pilithurak labune natha.
